mapper.sql: cid, category_id, name, image, phone, address, description, sale_num, dist, deliver_time, deliver_price, start_price, estimate, created, updated
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_merchants
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_merchants (cid, category_id, name, image, phone, address, description, sale_num, dist, deliver_time, deliver_price, start_price, estimate, created, updated ) values (#{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dist,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliverTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliverPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{estimate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
